_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Teamspeak3 Server
author: support@pterodactyl.io
description: VoIP software designed with security in mind, featuring crystal clear voice quality, endless customization options, and scalabilty up to thousands of simultaneous users.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# TS3 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk update
apk add tar curl

cd /mnt/server

curl http://dl.4players.de/ts/releases/${TS_VERSION}/teamspeak3-server_linux_amd64-${TS_VERSION}.tar.bz2 | tar xj --strip-components=1

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description: The version of Teamspeak 3 to use when running the server.
